A student at Gansu Agricultural University was criticized by school leaders for wearing a vest during nucleic acid testing, and all students were asked to write a self-criticism and reflect on this matter (?)
My suggestion is that you should wear Hanfu next time you do nucleic acid testing

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: I donâ€™t know. I donâ€™t know whatâ€™s wrong with wearing a vest. Can anyone tell me why? Is it because wearing a vest might cause you to catch a cold, and a cold might result in a positive test, and if you test positive, the schoolâ€™s epidemic prevention and control will be held accountable? Is that the logic? But I heard that this school has been closed for more than 50 days and there have been positive tests. It seems that they donâ€™t care much about the epidemic.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Some friends said that this person is mentally ill, and dared to take out loans to do business during the epidemic.
In fact, many friends also borrowed hundreds of thousands of yuan to do small businesses and used all kinds of online loans.
Because there is no other way, they can't find a job, and they don't know when the epidemic will end. They can only find ways to make a living immediately.
At first, they may just want to make enough money to pay off their mortgages and car loans through loans, but later it becomes how to keep their business.
This is the current situation.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Video 3
Zhengzhou University students enter the administration building
Teachers fled when they heard they were being recorded
Students read out their four demands in the empty hall
Including prohibiting the liquidation of students, strictly abiding by the State Council's twenty-point policy, and opening up campus infrastructure, etc.
According to the contributor, because no teacher dared to answer, the students left the administration building after reading.
The liquidation has begun now, and some have already notified the counselors and parents
